description:
Now that he’s settled into his new life, Koushi returns to school! Everyone wants to know where he’s been, but will Koushi’s childhood friend, Sutea, appreciate the truth?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Koushi macht sich Gedanken / Koushi kehrt in die Schule zurück
Koushi, at a Loss / Koushi Goes Back to School
Les tracas de Kôshi / Kôshi retourne en cours
孝士, 思い悩む / 孝士, 復学する
